params.amountCSDtoBurn: the amount of CSD coins to burn to redeem collateral. This function burns CSD and redeems underlying collateral in one transactio
params.tokenAddress: the address of token to be redeemed.

params.amountCollateral: The amount of collateral to deposit.
params.tokenCollateralAddress: The address of token (WETH/WBTC) to be deposited as token.)

params.amountCollateral: The amount of collateral you want to dposited
params.amountCsdToMint: The amount of CSD to be minted.
params.tokenCollateralAddress: The address of token to deposit as collateral

params.collateral: the erc20 token collateral that is to br liqudated.
params.debtToCover: the amount of CSD to burn to improve user's health factor.
params.user: the address of user whose health factor broke i.e went below MIN_HEALTH_FACTOR and has to be liqudated.

params.amountCsdToMint: The amount of Csd coins to mint.

liqudate(address,address,uint256).notice: You can partially liquidate a user.The liquidator gets a liquidation bonus for buying user's funds.The normal working of this function assumes the protocal will be 200% overcollateralized.A known bug is when the collateral value gets plummeted to 100% or less the protocol won't be able to incentive the liquidator.

mintCsd(uint256).notice: follows CIEthe requester must have more collateral than the minimum threshold.
